titleStmt.title: Fall not out by the way, or, A perswasion to a friendly correspondence between the conformists & non-conformists in a funeral discourse on Gen. 45. 24. occasioned by the desire of Mr. Anthony Dunwell, in his last will / by Timothy Rogers ...
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Timothy, 1658-1728.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
